review: Dr. Anurag Sir is a nice person. He explained to us the issue and gave us options. The tooth extraction process was painless. We recommend him for any tooth related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was facing difficulty in chewing as I was suffering from third molar pain. Then I visited smilebook dental for my treatment. Dr.Anurag was very kind and friendly in explaining the entire procedure. The treatment was just painless and comfortable. I strongly recommend Smilebook dental clinic for any of your dental problems.
